alert.note: Alert for Coastal Duval; Coastal Nassau; Inland Nassau; Trout River; Western Duval (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 10 at 2:43PM EST by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT NASSAU...NORTHWESTERN DUVAL... CAMDEN AND SOUTH CENTRAL GLYNN COUNTIES THROUGH 330 PM EST... At 243 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms capable of producing a landspout along a line extending from 8 miles west of Woodbine to near Hilliard to near St. George. Movement was northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Landspouts and wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... St. Marys, Kingsland, Brunswick, Fernandina Beach, Woodbine, Callahan, Jacksonville International Arpt, Kings Bay Base, Yulee, and Kings Ferry. LANDSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will relay your report to the National Weather Service office in Jacksonville. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 500 PM EST for northeastern Florida.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Duval; Coastal Nassau; Inland Nassau; Trout River; Western Duval
